item.title: Apple just released new updates for old versions of iOS, macOS, watchOS, more - 9to5Mac
item.description:
1. Apple just released new updates for old versions of iOS, macOS, watchOS, more  9to5Mac
  2. iPhone 5s Gets New Software Update 13 Years After Launch  MacRumors
  3. Apple releases surprise Big Sur update to keep FaceTime and Messages working  Macworld
  4. Apple patches ancient iOS versions to keep iMessage, FaceTime, other services working  Ars Technica
  5. Apple just killed the myth of iPhone forced obsolescence  Cult of Mac
